subject: Your loan request approved
body:
Your credit score doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE pocket money to spend ANY way you like, or simply want to LOWER your entire payment by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you TONIGHT (hurry, this deal will expire THIS NIGHT):
$375,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest entire payment!
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply complete this user-friendly form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit score will not disqualify you!!
http://ekwskuplore.com/
